amendatorysection.para: (1) The purpose of the nameplate capacity tax levied under section 77-6203 is to replace property taxes currently imposed on wind infrastructure and depreciated over a short period of time in a way that causes local budgeting challenges and increases upfront costs for wind developers;
(3) The nameplate capacity tax should be fair and nondiscriminatory when compared with other taxes imposed on other industries in the state; and
(4) The nameplate capacity tax should not be singled out as a source of General Fund revenue during times of economic hardship.
